overview: Wacky, wild, way-out hillbilly adventures are yours for the taking in Daisy May. Just who is Daisy May? She's a delicious and hot country gal who's dying to discover the secrets of hillbilly humping - and so much more. Set in Pussypatch, U.S.A., Daisy May is a rollicking and sex soaked parody of the popular cartoon series. Whether it's a backdoor encounter at the top of a mountain, or a double penetration behind the barn, Daisy May delivers the kind of good ol' fashioned sex that makes you proud to be an American.
title: Daisy May
